name: NINE LIVES - 2D CAT GAME
description:
This is the game I made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. This is an Idea I've had for a while and I merged it with the theme of "roll of a dice". The game is complete but very buggy and there's a lot to expand on. I think It gives a small look into what a finished fully polished version could look like. 

Thank you to anyone who plays the game and rates it! 

HOW TO PLAY:

The Orange Cat is fast moving and high jumping.

The Black Cat is slow moving and low jumping but very strong.

The Purple Cat is very fast moving but doesn't jump.

Push around boxes, jump on loaded springs, and weave between the rain drops. Try to make it home in one piece, and avoid the dogs if you can.

Secrets:

Dogs have a chance of rolling into birds. Birds will fly away from you.

The game will randomly roll your character to keep you on your toes.

Spikes will kill dogs.

Everything should be working as intended but since this was made in two days there is bound to be major bugs. Sorry if you run into any.
